DOC.brief_summary: Although long saphenous vein remain commonly use conduit coronary revascularization , traditional open vein harvest may lead significantly impair wound heal post-operative pain . To end , endoscopic saphenous vein harvest technique show reduce post-operative morbidity . Studies show endothelial integrity luminal nitric oxide synthase ( NOS ) good preserve novel `` no-touch '' technique ; however , effect associate mechanism endoscopic vein harvest endothelial integrity function remain unknown . Therefore , present proposal , collect saphenous vein segements immediately harvest , reperfusion , grafting , use enzyme-linked immunosorbant assay ( ELISA ) , immunohistochemical staining ( IHC ) , real-time polymerase chain reaction ( RT-PCR ) detect expression distribution endothelial NOS ( eNOS ) , endothelin-1 ( ET-1 ) , vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 ( VCAM-1 ) , intracellular adhesion molecule-1 ( ICAM-1 ) , platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule-1 ( PECAM-1 ) protein RNA level endothelium saphenous vein . The major aim study elucidate effect mechanism endoscopic saphenous vein harvest endothelial property compare conventional open vein harvest technique .
DOC.brief_title: Endoscopic Saphenous Vein Harvest Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting
